no.ntnu.diverslogbook.activities

Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.diverslogbook.activities.LoginActivity

  • public class LoginActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles login and authentication. Lets the user login using email/password or an existing account from google, twitter or facebook.
    Author:
    Lars Johan
